title: How To Find Low Competition Keywords In 6 Steps [Get More Traffic]
description:
Low competition keywords are much easier to rank for and you can start getting search traffic in a quicker time frame. But how do you find low competitor keywords that your website will actually be able to rank for?

In this video I’ll take you through exactly how to find the best low competition keywords to target.

Apply these 6 steps every time you do keyword research on any website to find low competition keywords. 

For more SEO tips, tricks and guides: https://FATJOE.com/

#lowcompetitionkeywords #keywordresearch #seo
----------------------------------------------

// What Is A Low Competition Keyword?

A low-volume keyword is simply a very specific, niche-oriented, and has little competition, this makes it easy to rank for.

The best thing is, by ranking for the low competition keywords and if done in the right way, you'll be indirectly boosting your ranking for the high competition keywords over time.
